title: [1.6.4][1.7.2]SSP/SMP 让你可以拥有minecraft怪物的技能【基因mod】大p玩过的
author: hou1193161263
txt_content:
哈喽，大家好，这是我第二次发帖子，希望大家支持！！！ 
步入正题{:10_530:}，今天给大伙带来的是mc界的最奇迹的一个视频，

大家应该看过大p的十一周目生存吧，里面其中的一个mod就是这个基因mod。
Posted 22 September 2013 - 09:46 AM
Advanced Genetics is a mod created by ObsiLP which adds Genetic-Science to Minecraft.

Offical Site: http://ag.teamdna.de
Wiki: http://ag.teamdna.de/wiki

Please refer to the wiki for pictures and mod informations.

- BUGS -
Bug-Tracker

- Download -
Downloads can be found on my Website.

- Spotlights -
All spotlights can be found on my Website.

Follow me on Twitter! @ObsiLP

Posted 22 September 2013 - 03:49 PMI got the enderman 'Teleport' Gene, How do I teleport?

Do you mind if I do a mod spotlight of it? 

Posted 22 September 2013 - 05:04 PMOh Thanks 

The Spotlight isnt the best ever, infact it's my 1st mod spotlight and your mod is quite complicated so i couldn't fit everything in to a great standard,

I'm editing it right now, when it's uploaded ill post the link here, if you want you could embed it to your top post

Great Mod, I'll be using and so will some friends   

这是我和我的基友们的生存，可好玩了，如果要一起玩，请加qq：1193161263 验证信息：我也要玩









里面的东西大家可以去尝试。
作者和搬运作者的话"
希望大家支持我，我会将mod继续做下去的，感谢大家对我的帮助，Thank for your help
金币扔了有不会死，大家扔吧！
